Headline: Delays on Loop 'L' (elevated lines)
ShortDescription: Brown, Green, Orange, Purple & Pink Line trains are experiencing delays due to mechanical problem on a train near Clark/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown, Green, Orange, Purple & Pink Line trains are experiencing delays due to mechanical problem on a train near Clark/Lake.

Crews are working to correct the problem.

Allow extra travel time.
